changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.createView: SELECT keyfigure.id ,IFNULL(keyfigure.uuid, '') AS uuid ,keyfigure.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,keyfigure.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(keyfigure.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(keyfigure.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(keyfigure.formula, '') AS formula ,IFNULL(keyfigure.aggregation, '') AS aggregation ,IFNULL(keyfigure.character, '') AS character ,IFNULL(keyfigure.type, '') AS type ,IFNULL(keyfigure.unit, '') AS unit ,IFNULL(keyfigure.value_range, '') AS value_range ,keyfigure.cumulation_possible ,keyfigure.fk_deleted_status_id ,keyfigure.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,keyfigure.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(keyfigure.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(keyfigure.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language ,IFNULL(keyfigure.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM keyfigure LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = keyfigure.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id
SELECT object_type.id ,IFNULL(object_type.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(object_type.name, '') AS name FROM object_type

SELECT client.id ,IFNULL(client.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(client.description, '') AS description ,client.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,client.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM client

SELECT project.id ,IFNULL(project.uuid, '') AS uuid ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(project.description, '') AS description ,project.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,project.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM project

SELECT sourcesystem.id ,IFNULL(sourcesystem.uuid, '') AS uuid ,sourcesystem.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,sourcesystem.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(sourcesystem.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(sourcesystem.description, '') AS description ,sourcesystem.fk_contact_group_id_as_supporter ,sourcesystem.fk_deleted_status_id ,sourcesystem.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,sourcesystem.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM sourcesystem LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = sourcesystem.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT data_delivery_object.id ,IFNULL(data_delivery_object.uuid, '') AS uuid ,data_delivery_object.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,data_delivery_object.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(data_delivery_object.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(data_delivery_object.description, '') AS description ,data_delivery_object.fk_tool_id ,data_delivery_object.fk_data_delivery_type_id ,data_delivery_object.fk_contact_group_id_as_data_owner ,data_delivery_object.fk_deleted_status_id ,data_delivery_object.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,data_delivery_object.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(data_delivery_object.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(data_delivery_object.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM data_delivery_object LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = data_delivery_object.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT map_object_2_object.id ,IFNULL(map_object_2_object.uuid, '') AS uuid ,map_object_2_object.fk_mapping_qualifier_id ,map_object_2_object.ref_fk_object_id_1 ,map_object_2_object.ref_fk_object_type_id_1 ,map_object_2_object.ref_fk_object_id_2 ,map_object_2_object.ref_fk_object_type_id_2 ,map_object_2_object.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,map_object_2_object.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM map_object_2_object

SELECT tool.id ,IFNULL(tool.uuid, '') AS uuid ,tool.fk_tool_type_id ,IFNULL(tool.tool_name, '') AS tool_name ,IFNULL(tool.vendor, '') AS vendor ,IFNULL(tool.version, '') AS version ,IFNULL(tool.comment, '') AS comment ,tool.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,tool.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM tool

SELECT object_depends_on.id ,IFNULL(object_depends_on.uuid, '') AS uuid ,object_depends_on.ref_fk_object_id_parent ,object_depends_on.ref_fk_object_type_id_parent ,object_depends_on.ref_fk_object_id_child ,object_depends_on.ref_fk_object_type_id_child ,object_depends_on.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,object_depends_on.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM object_depends_on

SELECT attribute.id ,IFNULL(attribute.uuid, '') AS uuid ,attribute.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,attribute.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(attribute.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(attribute.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(attribute.formula, '') AS formula ,attribute.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,attribute.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM attribute LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = attribute.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT tool_type.id ,IFNULL(tool_type.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(tool_type.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(tool_type.description, '') AS description ,tool_type.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,tool_type.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM tool_type

SELECT db_table.id ,IFNULL(db_table.uuid, '') AS uuid ,db_table.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,db_table.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(db_table.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(db_table.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(db_table.location, '') AS location ,db_table.fk_db_table_context_id ,db_table.fk_db_table_type_id ,db_table.fk_deleted_status_id ,db_table.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,db_table.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(db_table.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(db_table.source_comment, '') AS source_comment ,CASE WHEN (LENGTH(db_table.location) - LENGTH(REPLACE(db_table.location, '"."', ''))) / LENGTH('"."')>=2 THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(db_table.location ,1, INSTR(db_table.location,'.')-1),'"','') ELSE '' END AS databaseInfoFromLocation FROM db_table LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = db_table.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT db_table_field.id ,IFNULL(db_table_field.uuid, '') AS uuid ,db_table_field.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,db_table_field.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(db_table_field.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(db_table_field.description, '') AS description ,db_table_field.fk_db_table_id ,IFNULL(db_table_field.datatype, '') AS datatype ,IFNULL(db_table_field.bulk_load_checksum, '') AS bulk_load_checksum ,db_table_field.fk_deleted_status_id ,db_table_field.is_PrimaryKey ,db_table_field.is_BusinessKey ,db_table_field.is_GDPR_relevant ,db_table_field.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,db_table_field.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(db_table_field.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(db_table_field.source_comment, '') AS source_comment ,CASE WHEN (LENGTH(db_table.location) - LENGTH(REPLACE(db_table.location, '"."', ''))) / LENGTH('"."')>=2 THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(db_table.location ,1, INSTR(db_table.location,'.')-1),'"','') ELSE '' END AS databaseInfoFromLocation FROM db_table_field LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = db_table_field.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id LEFT JOIN db_table ON db_table.id = db_table_field.fk_db_table_id

SELECT db_table_context.id ,IFNULL(db_table_context.uuid, '') AS uuid ,db_table_context.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,db_table_context.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(db_table_context.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(db_table_context.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(db_table_context.prefix, '') AS prefix ,db_table_context.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,db_table_context.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM db_table_context LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = db_table_context.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT db_database.id ,IFNULL(db_database.uuid, '') AS uuid ,db_database.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,db_database.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(db_database.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(db_database.description, '') AS description ,db_database.fk_tool_id ,db_database.fk_deleted_status_id ,db_database.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,db_database.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(db_database.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(db_database.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language ,IFNULL(db_database.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM db_database LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = db_database.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT scheduling.id ,IFNULL(scheduling.uuid, '') AS uuid ,scheduling.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,scheduling.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(scheduling.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(scheduling.description, '') AS description ,scheduling.fk_tool_id ,IFNULL(scheduling.scheduling_series, '') AS scheduling_series ,scheduling.fk_deleted_status_id ,scheduling.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,scheduling.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(scheduling.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(scheduling.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language ,IFNULL(scheduling.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM scheduling LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = scheduling.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT parameter.id ,IFNULL(parameter.uuid, '') AS uuid ,parameter.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,parameter.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(parameter.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(parameter.description, '') AS description ,parameter.is_optional ,IFNULL(parameter.default_value, '') AS default_value ,IFNULL(parameter.datatype, '') AS datatype ,IFNULL(parameter.range, '') AS range ,parameter.fk_deleted_status_id ,parameter.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,parameter.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(parameter.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(parameter.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language ,IFNULL(parameter.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM parameter LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = parameter.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT db_table_type.id ,IFNULL(db_table_type.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(db_table_type.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(db_table_type.description, '') AS description ,db_table_type.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,db_table_type.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(db_table_type.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language FROM db_table_type

SELECT object_comment.id ,IFNULL(object_comment.uuid, '') AS uuid ,object_comment.fk_object_type_id ,object_comment.ref_fk_object_id ,object_comment.ref_fk_object_type_id ,IFNULL(object_comment.comment, '') AS comment ,IFNULL(object_comment.created_at_datetime, '') AS created_at_datetime ,object_comment.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,object_comment.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM object_comment

SELECT glossary.id ,IFNULL(glossary.uuid, '') AS uuid ,glossary.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,glossary.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(glossary.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(glossary.description, '') AS description ,glossary.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,glossary.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM glossary LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = glossary.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT data_delivery_type.id ,IFNULL(data_delivery_type.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(data_delivery_type.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(data_delivery_type.description, '') AS description ,data_delivery_type.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,data_delivery_type.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(data_delivery_type.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language FROM data_delivery_type

SELECT data_transfer_process.id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.uuid, '') AS uuid ,data_transfer_process.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,data_transfer_process.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.description, '') AS description ,data_transfer_process.fk_data_transfer_type_id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.location, '') AS location ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.source_internal_object_id, '') AS source_internal_object_id ,data_transfer_process.fk_deleted_status_id ,data_transfer_process.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,data_transfer_process.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.source_definition, '') AS source_definition ,IFNULL(data_transfer_process.source_comment, '') AS source_comment FROM data_transfer_process LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = data_transfer_process.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT data_transfer_type.id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_type.uuid, '') AS uuid ,IFNULL(data_transfer_type.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(data_transfer_type.description, '') AS description ,data_transfer_type.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,data_transfer_type.fk_datamanagement_process_id ,IFNULL(data_transfer_type.source_definition_language, '') AS source_definition_language FROM data_transfer_type

SELECT contact_group.id ,IFNULL(contact_group.uuid, '') AS uuid ,contact_group.fk_object_type_id ,contact_group.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(contact_group.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(contact_group.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(contact_group.short_name, '') AS short_name ,contact_group.fk_deleted_status_id ,contact_group.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,contact_group.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM contact_group

SELECT contact.id ,IFNULL(contact.uuid, '') AS uuid ,contact.fk_object_type_id ,contact.fk_contact_group_id ,contact.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(contact.givenname, '') AS givenname ,IFNULL(contact.surname, '') AS surname ,IFNULL(contact.email, '') AS email ,IFNULL(contact.phone, '') AS phone ,IFNULL(contact.mobile, '') AS mobile ,IFNULL(contact.ldap_cn, '') AS ldap_cn ,IFNULL(contact.description, '') AS description ,contact.fk_deleted_status_id ,contact.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,contact.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM contact

SELECT bracket.id ,IFNULL(bracket.uuid, '') AS uuid ,bracket.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,bracket.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(bracket.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(bracket.description, '') AS description ,bracket.fk_attribute_id ,bracket.fk_object_type_id_as_searchFilter ,bracket.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,bracket.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM bracket LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = bracket.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT bracket_searchPattern.id ,IFNULL(bracket_searchPattern.uuid, '') AS uuid ,bracket_searchPattern.fk_object_type_id ,bracket_searchPattern.fk_bracket_id ,IFNULL(bracket_searchPattern.searchPattern, '') AS searchPattern ,bracket_searchPattern.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,bracket_searchPattern.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM bracket_searchPattern

SELECT import_stage_db_table.id ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.client_name, '') AS client_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.project_name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_name, '') AS db_table_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_description, '') AS db_table_description ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_field_name, '') AS db_table_field_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_field_datatype, '') AS db_table_field_datatype ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_field_description, '') AS db_table_field_description ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_type_name, '') AS db_table_type_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_context_name, '') AS db_table_context_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.db_table_context_prefix, '') AS db_table_context_prefix ,import_stage_db_table.isPrimaryKeyField ,import_stage_db_table.isForeignKeyField ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.foreignKey_table_name, '') AS foreignKey_table_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.foreignKey_table_field_name, '') AS foreignKey_table_field_name ,import_stage_db_table._import_state ,import_stage_db_table._import_date ,import_stage_db_table.is_BusinessKey ,import_stage_db_table.is_GDPR_relevant ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.location, '') AS location ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.database_or_catalog, '') AS database_or_catalog ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.schema, '') AS schema ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.fk_project_id, '') AS fk_project_id ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.fk_db_database_id, '') AS fk_db_database_id ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.column_default_value, '') AS column_default_value ,import_stage_db_table.column_cant_be_null ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_1, '') AS additional_field_1 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_2, '') AS additional_field_2 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_3, '') AS additional_field_3 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_4, '') AS additional_field_4 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_5, '') AS additional_field_5 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_6, '') AS additional_field_6 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_7, '') AS additional_field_7 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_8, '') AS additional_field_8 ,IFNULL(import_stage_db_table.additional_field_9, '') AS additional_field_9 FROM import_stage_db_table LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = import_stage_db_table.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT url.id ,IFNULL(url.uuid, '') AS uuid ,url.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,url.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(url.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(url.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(url.url, '') AS url ,url.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,url.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM url LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = url.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id

SELECT object_persistence_method.id ,IFNULL(object_persistence_method.uuid, '') AS uuid ,object_persistence_method.fk_object_type_id ,IFNULL(object_persistence_method.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(object_persistence_method.description, '') AS description FROM object_persistence_method

SELECT datamanagement_process.id ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.uuid, '') AS uuid ,datamanagement_process.fk_object_type_id ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.description, '') AS description ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.tool, '') AS tool ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.tool_version, '') AS tool_version ,IFNULL(datamanagement_process.routine, '') AS routine FROM datamanagement_process
changeSet.comment: Used objects: v_keyfigure_SearchInterface v_object_type_SearchInterface v_client_SearchInterface v_project_SearchInterface v_sourcesystem_SearchInterface v_data_delivery_object_SearchInterface v_map_object_2_object_SearchInterface v_tool_SearchInterface v_object_depends_on_SearchInterface v_attribute_SearchInterface v_tool_type_SearchInterface v_db_table_SearchInterface v_db_table_field_SearchInterface v_db_table_context_SearchInterface v_db_database_SearchInterface v_scheduling_SearchInterface v_parameter_SearchInterface v_db_table_type_SearchInterface v_object_comment_SearchInterface v_glossary_SearchInterface v_data_delivery_type_SearchInterface v_data_transfer_process_SearchInterface v_data_transfer_type_SearchInterface v_contact_group_SearchInterface v_contact_SearchInterface v_bracket_SearchInterface v_bracket_searchPattern_SearchInterface v_import_stage_db_table_SearchInterface v_url_SearchInterface v_object_persistence_method_SearchInterface v_datamanagement_process_SearchInterface Phabricator tasks: T159
